statements: SELECT * FROM progress_reports;
SELECT project_id, team_id FROM progress_reports WHERE completed_tasks > 5;
SELECT team_id, report_date FROM progress_reports WHERE resource_allocated > 1000.50;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT project_id, completed_tasks, pending_tasks FROM progress_reports WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_id, team_id, report_date FROM progress_reports WHERE completed_tasks > 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT project_id, team_id, completed_tasks FROM progress_reports WHERE pending_tasks < 20 ORDER BY completed_tasks ASC
SELECT team_id, SUM(completed_tasks) AS total_completed_tasks FROM progress_reports GROUP BY team_id HAVING SUM(completed_tasks) > 100
SELECT project_id, pending_tasks, resource_allocated FROM progress_reports WHERE resource_allocated >= 5000 AND pending_tasks BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT project_id, team_id, report_date, completed_tasks, pending_tasks, resource_allocated FROM progress_reports WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM project_progress
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE status='In Progress'
SELECT * FROM project_progress ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT team_name, team_lead, productivity_score FROM team_productivity WHERE productivity_score > 80
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM project_progress ORDER BY start_date
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM team_productivity WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, productivity_score FROM team_productivity ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_productivity WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_percentage FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_progress WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, productivity_score FROM team_productivity ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_percentage FROM resource_allocation WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY allocation_percentage ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress INNER JOIN team_productivity ON project_progress.project_id = team_productivity.project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY projects.project_name;

SELECT employees.employee_name, employees.department, projects.project_name, project_tasks.task_name FROM employees INNER JOIN teams ON employees.employee_id = teams.team_lead_id INNER JOIN projects ON teams.project_id = projects.project_id INNER JOIN project_tasks ON teams.team_id = project_tasks.team_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM teams INNER JOIN employees ON teams.team_lead_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT task_name, status FROM project_tasks ORDER BY status DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS tasks_count FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, progress_status FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_status='completed';
SELECT team_name, productivity_score FROM TeamProductivity ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT project_id, total_resources_allocated FROM ProjectSummary WHERE completion_percentage >= 50;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_hours FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE allocation_hours < 40 ORDER BY allocation_hours ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT team_name, productivity_score, productivity_date FROM TeamProductivity ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_date, allocation_hours FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE project_id = 1 AND allocation_hours > 10;
SELECT project_id, total_resources_allocated, completion_percentage FROM ProjectSummary WHERE total_productivity_score > 100 ORDER BY completion_percentage DESC;
SELECT project_id, team_id FROM ProjectTeamMapping WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_status = 'delayed');
